verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%> in a vision, <S%H4236><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid, Abram. <S%H87><s%> I am your shield, <S%H4043><s%> your exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7235><s%> reward. <S%H7939><s%>"

Abram <S%H87><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> what will you give <S%H5414><s%> me, <S%H1980><s%> since I go childless, <S%H6185><s%> and he <S%H1121><s%> who will inherit my estate <S%H1004><s%> is <S%H1931><s%> Eliezer <S%H461><s%> of Damascus? <S%H1834><s%>"

Abram <S%H87><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H5414><s%> to me you have given no <S%H3808><s%> seed: <S%H2233><s%> and, <S%H1121><s%> behold, one born in my house <S%H1004><s%> is my heir. <S%H3423><s%>"

Behold, <S%H1697><s%> the word of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to him, <S%H559><s%> saying, "This man will not be your heir, <S%H3423><s%> but he who will come out <S%H3318><s%> of your own body <S%H4578><s%> will be your heir. <S%H3423><s%>"

Yahweh brought him outside, <S%H3318><s%> and <S%H2351><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Look <S%H5027><s%> now toward the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and count <S%H5608><s%> the stars, <S%H3556><s%> if you are able <S%H3201><s%> to count <S%H5608><s%> them. <S%H559><s%>" He said to Abram, <S%H3541><s%> "So shall your seed be. <S%H2233><s%>"
He believed <S%H539><s%> in Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and he reckoned <S%H2803><s%> it to him for righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3068><s%> "I am Yahweh who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees, <S%H3778><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you this land <S%H776><s%> to inherit it. <S%H3423><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> will I know <S%H3045><s%> that I will inherit it? <S%H3423><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3947><s%> "Bring me a heifer <S%H5697><s%> three years old, <S%H8027><s%> a female goat <S%H5795><s%> three years old, <S%H8027><s%> a ram <S%H352><s%> three years old, <S%H8027><s%> a turtledove, <S%H8449><s%> and a young pigeon. <S%H1469><s%>"

He brought <S%H3947><s%> him all of these, <S%H1334><s%> and divided them in the middle, <S%H8432><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> each <S%H376><s%> half <S%H1335><s%> opposite <S%H7125><s%> the other; <S%H7453><s%> but he didn't <S%H1334><s%> divide the birds. <S%H6833><s%>
The birds <S%H5861><s%> of prey came down <S%H3381><s%> on the carcasses, <S%H6297><s%> and Abram <S%H87><s%> drove them away. <S%H5380><s%>

When the sun <S%H8121><s%> was going down, <S%H935><s%> a deep sleep <S%H8639><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on Abram. <S%H87><s%> Now terror <S%H367><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> darkness <S%H2825><s%> fell on him. <S%H5307><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "Know <S%H3045><s%> for sure <S%H3045><s%> that your seed <S%H2233><s%> will live as foreigners <S%H1616><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> that is not theirs, <S%H5647><s%> and will serve them. <S%H6031><s%> They will afflict them four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
I will also judge <S%H1777><s%> that nation, <S%H1471><s%> whom they will serve. <S%H5647><s%> Afterward <S%H310><s%> they will come out <S%H3318><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wealth, <S%H7399><s%>
but you will go <S%H935><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%> You will be buried <S%H6912><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old age. <S%H7872><s%>

In the fourth <S%H7243><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> they will come here <S%H2008><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> is not yet <S%H2008><s%> full. <S%H8003><s%>"

It came to pass that, <S%H8121><s%> when the sun went down, <S%H935><s%> and it was dark, <S%H5939><s%> behold, <S%H6227><s%> a smoking furnace, <S%H8574><s%> and a flaming <S%H784><s%> torch <S%H3940><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> these pieces. <S%H1506><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abram, <S%H87><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "To your seed <S%H2233><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> this land, <S%H776><s%> from the river <S%H5104><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates: <S%H6578><s%>
the Kenites, <S%H7017><s%> the Kenizzites, <S%H7074><s%> the Kadmonites, <S%H6935><s%>
the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> the Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%>
the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%> and the Jebusites. <S%H2983><s%>"
